full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BRGYUD PA GSUM LDAN GYI DNGOS BRGYUD BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA'I GDUNG DBYANGS DGE LEGS CHAR 'BEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES BRGYUD PA GSUM LDAN GYI DNGOS BRGYUD BLA MA RNAMS LA GSOL BA 'DEBS SHING DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA'I GDUNG DBYANGS DGE LEGS CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI NYE 'KHOR BA RNAMS NAS BSKUL MA BYUNG BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MAS GNAS LUGS MNGON SUM DU GZEGS PA'I SGRUB GNAS KHYAD PAR CAN LHA SDINGS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
